version_description:
- Crypto-to-crypto trading
- New cryptocurrencies added
- Bug fixes

- Crypto-to-crypto trading
- New cryptocurrencies added
- Bug fixes

- Crypto-to-crypto trading
- New cryptocurrencies added
- Bug fixes

-Perform high-volume transactions with address whitelisting feature
-Reset your PIN instantly and start trading
-Advanced price charts for INR and crypto-to-crypto pairs
-Added new cryptocurrencies and crypto-to-crypto trading pairs

- New look for coin discovery
- INR equivalent rate for Buy/Sell to make accurate decisions
- You can mark your coins to Favorite
- Know which coins are trending!

- Support for EOS mainnet
- Bug fixes

- Introducing Zebpay - Cryptocurrency exchange in the Global market
- Ease of use for crypto trading (buy/sell) and wallet (send/ receive) transactions
- Enhanced security features

- Introducing Zebpay cryptocurrency exchange in the global market
- Ease of use for crypto trading (buy/sell) and wallet (send/ receive) transactions
- Enhanced security features

- Ease of use for crypto trading (buy/sell) and wallet (send/ receive) transactions
- Enhanced security features
- Bug fixes

- On-screen guide to help you use the new simplified trade interface.
- Place quick trade orders, as no PIN confirmation required.
- Know all your details in new profile section.
- Buy/Sell with your full balance in one go.
- Archive old/unused send addresses.
- View rate in native country currency while trading in crypto-to-crypto.
- Faster confirmations on tokens.
- Improved performance.
- Be more secured, while using shared device. Use the new logout feature.

- Know all your details in new profile section.

- Archive old/unused send addresses.
- View rate in native country currency while trading in crypto-to-crypto.
- Faster confirmations on tokens.
- Improved performance.
- Be more secured, while using shared device. Use the new logout feature.
- Bug fixes

- Improved my orders interface with a simplified view and more details.
- Get all your shared information with Zebpay, anytime with Export data in machine-readable format.

- Improved my orders interface with a simplified view and more details.
- Get all your shared information with Zebpay, anytime with Export data in machine-readable format.

- Protect your order from market loss by using our new Stop Limit feature
- Now know your account related updates from Activity Log
- Bug fixes

- Protect your order from market loss by using our new Stop Limit feature
- Now know your account related updates from Activity Log
- Bug fixes

- Now you can trade with BTC-Euro
- Support for Euro deposits and withdrawal
- Bug fixes

- Now you can trade with BTC-Euro
- Support for Euro deposits and withdrawal
- Bug fixes

- Complete your on-boarding hassle free within a minute
- New customers get a special Welcome Reward of â‚¬10
- Verify your email ID with ease using Twitter/Facebook/Google login
- Bug fixes

- UI improvements
- Bug fixes

- An all new Zebpay 3.0 experience brings significant upgrade to UI and styling
- Performance improvements for home screen
- Bug fixes

Following the words of Peter Heg "If you want to support others you have to stay upright yourself." A new technology integration awaits us in this release - this will help us continue delivering amazing support to you. P.S. And, while the journey to deliver awesomeness is never ending, we have squashed several bugs to make your Zebpay ride smoother!

Someone once said, innovation lies at the cross roads of courage and creativity. At Zebpay we are excited to be the first to integrate Lightning Network payments. This is a landmark step towards our vision of empowering consumers w.r.t. their financial destiny. #setcryptofree

- Buy and sell cryptos in the fastest possible way with our Instant feature, while enjoying several UI enhancements that would make your Zebpay experience even smoother.

- And we know you hate bugs, we did our bit to squash a few of them

Get your trades executed right in middle of the action with our Market IOC trade feature. And to make you look cool we have an all new profile page as well.
As always, Captain Zebpay is back to save the day, several bugs were stopped before they snap their fingers at you :)

Aussie Aussie Aussie! Oi Oi Oi!

- Zebpay is now live in Australia! Crypto enthusiasts from down under can now buy/sell Bitcoin and other crypto instantly with AUD on the Zebpay mobile app & website. Zebpay supports Bitcoin, Ether, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash & Litecoin in Australia.
- A bug fix a day keeps the problem away. Your Zebpay app is now more bug-free.
- Weâ€™re bringing you a more refined Zebpay experience, with subtle UI improvements.

Your Zebpay app spent some time in the gym and as a result is fitter & faster than before.
And the bugs that were giving us the heebie jeebies, Dr. Devs stepped in and bug-busted them.

Your Zebpay app spent some time in the gym and as a result is fitter & faster than before.
And the bugs that were giving us the heebie jeebies, Dr. Devs stepped in and bug-busted them.

Kaching! Now receive Bitcoin lightning payments into your Zebpay wallet at the least possible fee. So go ahead, generate some invoices and stack those Satoshis.
Weâ€™ve also done up the boring old KYC process into an effortless experience, so you can stop and smell the UX roses on your way to crypto world.

Don't miss that right opportunity to trade your cryptos, our rate alerts are now on the iPhone.
Some bugs were making us furious, so we got rid of them real fast!

- Neo has upskilled inside the matrix and can dodge bullets faster.
- He also said goodbye to many more Bug agents.
Weâ€™re really good at catching bugs! A few were fixed, and some awesome features were added.
Weâ€™re really good at catching bugs! A few were fixed, and some awesome features were added.

New feature alert!
Zebpay's easy statement generator is here. Just key in dates, punch in your preferred format and download the glorious past of your crypto transactions with Zebpay. Here's to great record keeping and making messy tax filings a thing of the past.
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements
- Minor bug fixes and performance improvements

- ZebPay is back in India! Our members in India can now trade Bitcoin, Ether, Ripple, TrueUSD and Tether on the ZebPay mobile app.
- Seamlessly move between ZebPay Pro-Trader on the desktop and your mobile app.
- Complete your KYC on the app to enjoy all our features.
